articles.description: Arsenal host Liverpool on Sunday in what is likely to be an important match in the Premier League title race, even this early in the season.
articles.title: Arsenal vs Liverpool: Premier League title rivals meet on Sunday in crucial match

articles.description: England are exhilarating when they are good but infuriating when they are not. Stephan Shemilt tackles five questions after defeat in Pakistan.
articles.title: England in Pakistan: Ollie Pope, Ben Stokes & Test cricket among five takeaways

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Barcelona in the Primera División
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Barcelona: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.description: Ferrari’s Carlos Sainz beats title rivals Max Verstappen and Lando Norris to pole position at the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Mexico Grand Prix: Sainz on pole, but Norris 'happy' with third

articles.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers enjoy a 4-2 win over the New York Yankees to take a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven World Series.
articles.title: MLB World Series 2024: Dodgers 4-2 Yankees - Yoshinobu Yamamoto stars in game two

articles.description: Ex-Liverpool manager Rafa Benitez explains how new Reds boss Arne Slot will learn about the character of his side, for the times they need it most.
articles.title: Why Arne Slot's Liverpool still have a lot to learn about each other - Rafa Benitez

articles.description: LeBron James and Anthony Davis combine for 63 points as the LA Lakers come from behind to beat the Sacramento Kings.
articles.title: LA Lakers 131-127 Sacramento Kings: LeBron James & Anthony Davis shine

articles.description: Ilia Topuria - a big Real Madrid fan - emerges as a UFC 'Galactico' after stunning Max Holloway to retain his featherweight title.

articles.description: Their teams are at opposite ends of the Premier League table, but Man City manager Pep Guardiola says he "will learn" from Southampton boss Russell Martin.
articles.title: Man City 1-0 Southampton: Pep Guardiola says he 'will learn' from Russell Martin

articles.description: Jack Catterall earns his third headline win in a year and puts himself in position for a title fight in 2025 with victory over Regis Prograis in their light-welterweight bout in Manchester.
articles.title: Catterall vs Prograis: Briton wins thriller, plus Campbell Hatton loses
